extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running a vulnerable version of Jira (5.3.0 to 5.5.0) and if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is upgrading to the latest fixed version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Jira to the latest fixed versions 5.3.3, 5.5.1, or 5.6.0 or later to remediate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Temporary Workaround
extracted_playbook.description: Manually upgrade the version-specific JAR file as a temporary workaround if an upgrade is not immediately possible.
